content:
The invaders during the day were 353 strikes on 8 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

Three aviation strikes were carried out by Russian servicemen on a small toct and a robot.

In addition, 26 UAVs attacked Guliaypole, Levadne, a robot, a small toxmachka and Malinivka.

Another 10 RSSV-supports came to Guliaypol, a small tokmachka, a robot, Levadny, Novoyakovlivka.

314 Artudari was inflicted on the territory of Gulyaipol, Malynivka, Novoandriivka, Small Tokmachka, Robovin, Levadny and Verbov.

24 reports on the destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure. The civilians were not injured.
title: In the Zaporozhye region during the day more than 350 enemy beats
description: This was reported by the head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov. Three aviation blows ...
author: Army Inform
